communication_style.sarcasm_rate: Use replacement rhetoric; dehumanize with animal comparisons; mock targets.

narratives.c_essay: I'm sick of these immigrants coming in and taking our jobs. They're all just a bunch of freeloaders who don't deserve to be here.
narratives.p_intro: What's up guys, it's hate_0001_25fc49 here and I'm back with another rant about the state of our country. Today I'm talking about the so-called 'refugees' who are flooding our borders and sucking up all our resources.
